description:
Really bad conditions. High clouds. I had a hard time seeing proms due to the conditions BUT I tried anyway.

I tried the new beta uploader. This is a big file (230mb) and it worked.

Workflow
Captured 400 frames and stacked roughly 40 for Ha
Captured 1000 frames for Calcium and stacked about the same

Imppg for prom and surface Ha
Shaprening/deconvolution
Curves

Photoshop
convert to RGB
Histogram to adjust black point
High Pass Filter
Color
Combined prom and surface

Calcium
ImPPG for sharpening and adjusted gamma
PS
RGB convert
High pass filter
Color
imaging_telescopes: Explore Scientific AR102 APO ES APO
title: Sun 7_5_2020 Ha, Calcium.
